page.title: 06EVENTS OF LITTLEMILL GALA
page.content: {MONDAY:}Queen is crowned followed by a concert. {TUESDAY: }Old folks concert. Five-a-side football and Netball for those who wish to take part. {WEDNESDAY: }Under 11 disco and pet show. {THURSDAY: }Bingo and more sports. {FRIDAY: }Disco for 12-16 year olds. {SATURDAY: }Gala Day Parade. There are floats and people dress up. Prizes are given for the best float as well as the funniest and most original costume. Sports. Picnic. People come from the surrounding area and everyone does their best to make it an enjoyable end to the fun week in the community.
